title: Machine Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Activity·Problem·Project-Based Mobile Anatomy and Physiology Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Students can explain brain structure-related technical terms in their native language and a second language with over 80% accuracy
Learners can explain the interaction of body systems as problem-solving methods using everyday life examples (e.g., muscle activity during exercise)
Learners can complete one human organ interconnection project using smartphone-based collaboration tools within four weeks

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
